reviews.review: Pretty fun to play with friends
Can be fun, but also can be very not fun.

This game is fucking ass.
I'd been a fan of the game for so long, and put up with so many glitches, bugs, exploits and general shittiness that comes with an unbalanced game.
But this is just ridiculous. Matchmaking puts you with fucking cavemen, making the game unplayable, even if you're a red rank survivor.
The unbalanced matchmaking becomes even more apparent when you switch over to killer.
Play as Survivor = Teammates who do nothing the whole game, killers that only target you while your teammates stand in a corner tbagging out of boredom.
Play as Killer = You get put against a swf that outplay you no matter what perks you use.
All in all, this game fucking sucks now, both sides suffer from matchmaking.
All the Quebecois are good at doing is, being racist, and making shit games.
if you have anxiety this is a great game, fun with friends.
интересно, но быстро надоедает, всё однообразно
Świetna Gra mimo że boje się Horrorów to ta nie jest straszna
it's like league devs meet spooky horror game

O jogo é muito bom mas o Matchmaking deixa a desejar, constantemente você se encontra sendo pareado com pessoas com o Rank totalmente diferente do seu. Em certas partidas você cai com pessoas que parecem ter apenas 2 dígitos de QI e em outras você tem a sensação de estar jogando com jogadores profissionais. Tirando isso, podem comprar sem medo!
if your a low rank killer ur not going to have fun the match making sucks.

맞으면서 배우는 재미난 게임 
잘하고 싶으면 유튜브 보면서 배우면 금방 빨랭감 (응삼이 유튜브) 추천
좋은 기술들을 많이 알려줌 (응틀넘기,히오스 판자 등등)

its ok
edit: no it is not
This game just playing alone is already amazing but when you get to play with a bunch of friends its amazing

Eu gosto muito deste jogo e estou muito triste com a ultima atualização. A melhoria dos gráficos do jogo é muito bem vinda, mas não há uma forma leve de rodar o jogo. Meu note agora trava quando tento entrar no mapa.
Antes rodava. 
Não posso mais jogar.

Chateado...
Lag switch, rubberband, broken MMR, easy anti cheat
非常的爽，特别是砍人的时候，我准备在现实里试试。
Its a game, ive played it, killer is fun, survivor is getting shafted then getting saved by the person who shafted you to begin with.

Baixei e simplesmente não consigo jogar, quando aperto spaço pra iniciar o jogo ele informa um erro de conexão com a internet sendo que eu estou conectada e a rede está normal, já fiz todo o recomendado e ele não funciona.
Jogo muito bacana recomendo mt para jogar com amigos mas como eu n tenho amigos eu jogo sozinho e e triste
This game is awesome.. i like to be the survivor lol.
its fun and games till YOU'RE GONNA BE AT RED RANKS, YOU NEED TO HANDLE WITH 999 IQ KILLERS, THAT LITERALLY KNOWS EVERY MECHANIC OF THE GAME, but yeah, cool game
good game very fun yes good

A bit glitchy, but has been one of my favorite steam games for literal years. Fun and quick gameplay, interesting characters, and a cool points system. People can be kind of annoying and the perks are way too accessible but I still love it.

best game for real
its not actually that scary

changed review: 7/20/2022

New update absolutely destroyed solo queue and makes it impossible to play. You'd be lucky if you'd even have 3 gens done by the time everyones dead. Thanks Behavior for another lackluster and terribly unbalanced update..

Everyone is running thanato and legion/plague and getting 4ks within 7 min... if u manage to stay alive gl with gen lock b/c matches are going to be like 25min of solid 0 gen progress

This is one of my favorite multiplayer games ever. I typically don't like playing online with random people but this game just fills me with adrenaline constantly and makes me keep going for just one more game well into the night. Just got it on steam already have it on switch, still amazing.

Started playing this back when there were 3 or 4 killers, and got back into it recently (2-3 months ago). While there were some bad moments (Toxic players and slight glitches, especially around big updates), I still love the game and would recommend it wholly and honestly.
Apesar dos diversos bugs e problemas com a comunidade, o jogo é mt bom... Eu amo!!
I'm new to it, but it's very entertaining so far. Ironically, it's a good stress reliever.
i like this game not bad but graphic is so so baaad

So i am changing my review to make a point to the community. I main survivor and can say that No One Escapes Death SUCKS to go against but need i remind you that it is NOT the killers fault for using it. It is also NOT the survivors fault for using Decisive Strike, it's just common sense to use an extremely overpowered perks given the chance to. PLEASE redirect you dislike of these perks to the developers of this game for taking waaaaayyyyy too long to nerf them instead of blaming each other for just being smart, Thank You. 

P.S. T-bagging and spamming flashlight in exit area is toxic, survivors. Don't be a d**k if you win, It's unsportsmanlike.

I wouldn't suggest buying an early access game for 20+ bucks but its still amazing for an early access and if you got the money to spend i would suggest giving it a try. Multiply is still buggy atm so only get it if you can play it solo

I love everything about this game. Killer is the most fun to play and will get you less angry than playing as the survivor. Demogorgon is the greatest, if you know what you're doing. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to get it.
